Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs. Given its value and quality, we are confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you are interested. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
